hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Morpha#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Milk Bottle#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Milk Bottle#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Hover Boots#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?
